title: Leadville 100 MTB Course Record Holder Annika Langvad on Her 2015 Race, Women’s-Only Start Lines, and Gravel
content:
Langvad is the only women to have gone sub-seven hours at the 100-mile mountain bike race. She's expecting her first child next week.

Read the full article at Leadville 100 MTB Course Record Holder Annika Langvad on Her 2015 Race, Women’s-Only Start Lines, and Gravel on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
